hero.title: Your trusted virtual fitting room.
hero.subtitle: Find the perfect outfit without trying on 510 pants or making infinite returns.

promo.description: Ready-to-wear looks, selected by our AI according to style, occasion and mood.

clients.section_title: Made for brands, stores and real people
clients.description: TryOnYou connects with catalogs, collections and sizing data to reduce returns and increase conversion.

howitworks.title: How TryOnYou works
steps: 1. The user enters and answers the minimum necessary.
2. AI analyzes garments, combinations and personal style.
3. We show ready outfits in seconds.

about.title: Fewer returns, more happy people
paragraphs: Every return is lost time, burned money and clothes traveling without meaning.
Our goal: everything you buy fits you perfectly the first time.

footer.mini_cta: Want to integrate TryOnYou into your brand? Request the demo.
